title: What are the causes of fires in electrical installations? - Quora

response.answer_text: Overloads cause heating and the equipment may catch fire. For example, a short circuit leads to lot of current overload. Fuses, thermal switches, circuit breaks etc. may be malfunctioning. I am not an electrical engineer. The wiring may have deteriorated over time. I am not an electrical engineer. An electrical engineer could gives more details.
